title: Firebolt App Manifest: Distributor Config: Catalog Config

enableCloudMetadataInCatalog.description: Whether the app has cloud metadata available, and it should be shown when the app is present in a device’s App Catalog. Aggregated Experience can query this value to know to request cloud metadata for this app. Default: false.

enableCloudMetadataInLibrary.description: Whether the app has cloud metadata available, and it should be shown when the app is present in a device’s App Library. Aggregated Experience can query this value to know to request cloud metadata for this app. Default: false.

cloudMetadataCatalogName.description: Catalog name for accessing cloud metadata for the app. Required if enableCloudMetadataInCatalog or enableCloudMetadataInLibrary is true. When using XVP, this is the supportCatalogType value to send to ARS.
